title: Task Frontmatter
description: Validates the YAML frontmatter of task files in .project/tasks/. Tasks are A2A-compatible work items with structured status tracking, assignment, priority, and dependency management.

id.description: Unique identifier for this task (e.g., task-001).

status.description: Current task status. Values align with A2A protocol states.

assignee.description: Who is assigned to this task.

type.description: Whether the assignee is a human user or an AI agent.

id.description: Identifier of the assigned user or agent.

blocked_by.description: List of task IDs that must be completed before this task can proceed.

blocks.description: List of task IDs that are blocked by this task.

context_id.description: A2A contextId for grouping related tasks (e.g., sprint identifier).
